price: 22਼ ਬੇਸ਼ੱਕ ਆਖ਼ਿਰਤ ਵਿਚ ਘਾਟੇ ਵਿਚ ਰਹਿਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਇਹੋ ਲੋਕ ਹੋਣਗੇ।
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
